response.original_title: Dick and Dom in da Bungalow: The Dirty Norris Files
response.overview: Welcome to the first ever Dick & Dom in da Bungalow DVD!  Can't get enough of the Bungalow? Wish you could see it every day? Well now that you have this amazing DVD in your sweaty palms... you can!  Dick & Dom have been clearing out their dirty bungalow, and have found loads of brilliant bits from their last series (especially under the sofa and dried into the carpet) just for you! 'The Dirty Norris Files' is stuffed full of all your favourite clips from Series 3, including the Diddies, creamy muck muck fights and best of all Bogies!  Dick & Dom are the tour guides on your DVD ride, which features specially filmed links, interactive menus and loads of extra mucky stuff!
response.title: Dick and Dom in da Bungalow: The Dirty Norris Files
